      • drawLeftToRightReactionCenterMoleculeImage

        public void drawLeftToRightReactionCenterMoleculeImage(java.io.File outputDir,
                                                       org.openscience.cdk.interfaces.IReaction mappedReaction,
                                                       java.util.List<java.lang.String> reactionCenterSigs,
                                                       java.lang.String reactionID)
                                                throws java.io.IOException
        Draw a left-to-right reaction with atoms highlighted as reaction centers. Files are drawn as "$ouputDir/$reactionID.png".
        Parameters:
        mappedReaction - mapped reaction
        reactionCenterSigs - the reaction center signatures
        reactionID - the id of the reaction
        outputDir - the directory to put the files in
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if there is a problem writing the file
